name: Oleg Domanov
summary: Lead iOS Engineer with 25 years of experience building high-performance, user-centric iOS applications. Expert in Swift, SwiftUI, UIKit, and Objective-C with deep knowledge of Apple Human Interface Guidelines, accessibility, and App Store submission. Proven track record delivering consumer and enterprise apps with strong architecture, performance tuning, offline-first data handling, and robust CI/CD pipelines.

experience.title: Lead iOS Engineer
experience.summary: Led multiple iOS product teams delivering high-traffic consumer apps with robust architecture, offline-first data, and strong observability. Owned App Store submissions, release processes, and CI/CD hardening.
highlights: Shipped 15+ App Store apps with 1M+ combined users, maintaining 4.7+ average ratings through stability and UX optimizations.
Designed clean, modular architectures (MVC â†’ MVVM + Coordinators) enabling faster feature delivery and easier testability.
Built offline-first data layers using Combine + Core Data/Realm with conflict resolution and background sync.
Reduced cold-start time by 35% and improved scroll/render performance via Instruments-driven profiling and view hierarchy slimming.
Implemented CI/CD with Fastlane and GitHub Actions: automated builds, unit/UI tests, code signing, and TestFlight promotion.
Hardened security: Keychain usage, certificate pinning, secure storage, and privacy-compliant analytics/consent flows.

experience.title: Senior iOS Engineer
experience.summary: Delivered feature-rich iOS apps for marketing and analytics clients, with emphasis on performance, reliability, and scalable navigation flows.
highlights: Implemented complex UI/UX with custom animations and reusable UI components, cutting delivery time for new screens by 25%.
Optimized network layers with caching, reachability handling, and graceful degradation for low-connectivity users.
Integrated real-time analytics, push/deep links, and A/B testing to drive engagement and measurable conversion gains.
Improved app stability by driving crash-free sessions above 99.5% via proactive instrumentation and regression suites.

experience.title: iOS Developer
experience.summary: Built foundational iOS skills across multiple client apps, focusing on UI quality, accessibility, and reliable data handling.
highlights: Delivered responsive, localized interfaces with strong adherence to Apple HIG and VoiceOver support.
Managed data persistence with Core Data and synchronization patterns suitable for early iOS architectures.
Partnered with designers to achieve pixel-perfect UI while maintaining accessibility and performance.
